logic.users

Class Mechanic

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.users.User
      • logic.users.Mechanic

  • public class Mechanic
extends User
    Class used to describe a mechanic working on an assembly line in a car manufacturing company.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mechanic(CarManufacturingCompany company, java.lang.String userName)
      Constructs a new mechanic initializing its company and user name with the given parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doTask(Task task, int duration)
      Performs a task if the task is compatible with the active workstation of the mechanic and tries to move the assembly line.
      Workstation getActiveWorkstation()
      Returns the workstation the mechanic is currently working on.
      java.util.List<Task> getAllTasks(Workstation station)
      Returns a list of all tasks at a given workstation.
      java.util.List<Task> getAvailableTasks()
      Returns a list tasks that are currently pending at this mechanic's active workstation.
      java.util.List<Workstation> getWorkstations()
      Returns the list of workstations from the assembly line of the car manufacturing company.
      boolean isPosted()
      Returns whether the mechanic is working at any workstation.
      void setActiveWorkstation(Workstation station)
      Set the active workstation to the given workstation.

        java.lang.String userName)
        Constructs a new mechanic initializing its company and user name with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        company - The car manufacturing company the new mechanic works for.
        userName - The user name for this new mechanic.

    • Method Detail

      • getActiveWorkstation

        public Workstation getActiveWorkstation()
        Returns the workstation the mechanic is currently working on.
        Returns:
        The workstation the mechanic is currently working on.

      • isPosted

        public boolean isPosted()
        Returns whether the mechanic is working at any workstation.
        Returns:
        False if the active workstation is null. True otherwise.

      • doTask

        public void doTask(Task task,
          int duration)
        Performs a task if the task is compatible with the active workstation of the mechanic and tries to move the assembly line.
        Parameters:
        task - A copy of the task that needs to be performed.

      • getAvailableTasks

        public java.util.List<Task> getAvailableTasks()
        Returns a list tasks that are currently pending at this mechanic's active workstation.
        Returns:
        null if the mechanic is not currently posted. The list of tasks otherwise.

      • getAllTasks

        public java.util.List<Task> getAllTasks(Workstation station)
        Returns a list of all tasks at a given workstation.
        Parameters:
        station - The a copy of the workstation for which the tasks are needed.
        Returns:
        A list of tasks at the given workstation.

        public java.util.List<Workstation> getWorkstations()
        Returns the list of workstations from the assembly line of the car manufacturing company.
        Returns:
        the list of workstations from the assembly line of the car manufacturing company.
